name: MadLibs
description:
Just posting an old-OLD game I made when I was 16 and 17 (complete with grammar errors) and released on the BBSs.  Mostly curious to see if I could post it here to run in a browser via a DOSBox port.

(If the game window stops responding to keys, set the focus to the "Enter fullscreen" button.)

WARNING

It has a grueling DOS interface.

For example, it will ask you to enter all of this before you can see the stories:

noun: noun: noun: noun: noun: noun: noun: noun: noun: noun: verb: verb: verb: verb: adverb: adverb: adverb: adverb: Number# Number# Number# Number# adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: adjective: Geographical Location: Geographical Location: Car: Car: persons Name: persons Name: persons Name: persons Name: persons Name: persons Name: liquid: liquid: EXCLAMITORY word!!! EXCLAMITORY word!!!

You've been warned (but it's kinda worth it regardless).
